title: My Thunderbird does not appear on new computer
content:
I had all files downloaded from my old PC to an external harddrive and uploaded to a new PC. My Thunderbird account does not appear on the new one. How do I correct this?

Thanks for any help with this.

Damian
creator: dspower

title: Recent Thunderbird Update now downloads deleted messages from Gmail
content:
First, here's how I process incoming email, which first goes to my Gmail address. I delete about half of my messages unread, and about one-quarter more after reading/scanning them. The remainder are then downloaded after I open TB on my Windows PC and select Get Mail (F5).

'Until about Aug. 20, everything worked as planned, even though TB was also downloading some of my Sent messages.

But since then, with no setup changes made by me, TB also includes ALL the messages that I previously deleted at the Gmail site. So I must delete them again, a tedious, annoying process. Experimenting, I overcame the problem by permanently deleting the trashed messages at Gmail before launching TB. It also amount to double deleting, but it is much faster that way.

WHAT MUST I DO to restore the previous functionality of this process? 

I'm not a techie, but began using Eudora over 25 years ago, so PLEASE don't replies with guesses.
creator: larry41

title: Thnuderbird
content:
I first noticed on 8/26, that I can't send any emails. When I try, I receive the following Send Message Error:

Sending of the message failed. An error occurred while sending mail. The mail server responded: Authentication required. Please verify that your email address is correct in your account settings and try again.

I have not made any changes to my account except for a recent update.

Please advise.

Thank you kindly. cynthia620@comcast.net
creator: cynthia620
